entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.3°C

Visibility: 16.1 km

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of snow or drizzle near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
